content: 4 place marker m1l row 1 k to end row 2 k to first marker m1r slip marker k to second marker slip marker m1l k to end repeat row 1-2 until you have 62 stitches on needles 3 and 4 a total of 94 stitches fleegle heel rs set-up row on needles 1-2 continue working chart k33 k2tog k1 turn ws set-up row sl1p p5 p2togtbl p1 turn row 1 sl1k k to one stitch before the gap k2tog k1 turn row 2 sl1p p to one stitch before the gap p2togtbl p1 turn © sanni koivumäki 2016 4 repeat row 1-2 until two stitches remain after the gap on both sides sl1k k to 1 st before gap k2tog k to end of needle 4 do not turn row 1 continue working in the round working chart on needles 1-2 on needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle 4 row 2 on needles 1-2 work chart on needle 3 ssk k to last 2 sts of needle 4 k2tog leg continue working chart on needles 1-2 on needles 3-4 k all sts when leg measures 10 cm / 4 begin rib *k2tbl p2* repeat to end of round repeat rib pattern until cuff measures 2 5 cm / 1 bind-off using elizabeth zimmermann s sewn bind off soak block enjoy written instructions for left sock chart row 1 k5 k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 ssk k to end row 2 and all even-numbered row k all sts row 3 k5 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk k to end row 5 k6 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k to end row 7 k7 yo sl1-k2tog-psso yo k to end written instructions for right sock chart row 1 k20 k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 ssk k to end row 2 and all even-numbered row k all sts row 3 k20 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk k to end row 5 k21 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k to end row 7 k22 yo sl1-k2tog-psso yo k to end © sanni koivumäki 2016 5 left sock chart right sock chart = k = k o = yo / = k2tog \ = ssk a = sl1-k2tog-psso © sanni koivumäki 2016
